00021 #ifndef KEYPOINT_H
00022 #define KEYPOINT_H
00023 
00024 #include <cv.h>
00025 
00029 
00030 
00031 
00035 class keypoint
00036 {
00037 public:
00038   keypoint(void) {}
00039   ~keypoint() {}
00040 
00042   float u, v;  
00043   
00044   float scale; 
00045   float score; 
00046 
00047 
00049   float orientation_in_radians; 
00050 
00052 
00053   float meanI, sigmaI;
00054   keypoint * potential_correspondent;
00055   float match_score;
00056   int i_bucket, j_bucket;
00057 
00058   int index; // used to locate the keypoint in the keypoint array after matching.
00060 };
00061 
00069 inline CvPoint mcvPoint(keypoint & p)
00070 {
00071   int s = int(p.scale);
00072   int K = 1 << s;
00073   return cvPoint(int(K * p.u + 0.5), int(K * p.v + 0.5));
00074 }
00075 
00077 #endif // KEYPOINT_H
